data.name: レイジングブラスターズ Demo
data.detailed_description:
Raging Blasters is a vertical scroll shmup featuring high speed scrolling and the exhilaration of destruction.
In the demo version, you can only play Caravan mode. Caravan mode is a 3-minute limited challenge to get a high score.
data.about_the_game:
Raging Blasters is a vertical scroll shmup featuring high speed scrolling and the exhilaration of destruction.
In the demo version, you can only play Caravan mode. Caravan mode is a 3-minute limited challenge to get a high score.
data.short_description: Raging Blasters is a vertical scroll shmup featuring high speed scrolling and the exhilaration of destruction. In the demo version, you can only play Caravan mode. Caravan mode is a 3-minute limited challenge to get a high score.
data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows10,8,7
  • Processor: CPU 1.5GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 x 720
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows10,8,7
  • Processor: CPU 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 x 720
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
